post_content: Feeling super great today! Looking forward to my workout.
Has anyone tried CHIPTOLE yet??? It is SOOOOO good.
I HATE Chipotle!! Only weirdos like it.
If I could eat nothing and survive a fulfulling life then I totally would.
I'm definitely more of a Qdoba person myself!
The real crime with all these restaurants is the lack of free chips and salsa!!!
My triceps are on fire. GOTTA GET THOSE MUSCLESSSS.
Here is a totally unique and awesome post!
